title: Mortar Brig

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Fire your mortar at someone, dealing an Unstoppable Astral Rampage attack. (Two night cooldown)
- Sail behind someone during the day, redirecting all of your visitors to them until the next day. (One day cooldown)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot fire your mortar until Night 3.
- Your mortar has a 50% chance of hitting your intended target and a 50% chance of instead hitting one of their living neighbors.
- You cannot fire your mortar while you are hidden.

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- You now have Basic defense and not Vulnerable.
- Your mortar will now always hit your intended target and now has a one-night cooldown.

desc:
Post 5218
*Not a BToS2 port. Just a mortar brig.*
